Articles.Content:
Salutations everyone!

My name is Richard, I curently work as a Lead Character FX TD at Illumination MacGuff (the guys who brought the Minions to life) on a top secret project!

I recently started my stream channel on twitch: Rich To The Rescue!

The concept is simple, you send me your save games, and I go and rescue the Kerbals you lost on the live stream! Had 3 episodes so far, and they were all successful so far

I'll post a thread soon to explain how to participate.

You can follow me on twitter at @RichardAdenot

When geeking is not an option, I hide behind a lens and shoot the world around me. You can see my work on 500px and on my professional photography Page on twitter at @DitchThatSelfie or on my facebook page: Ditch That Selfie

Thx for dropping by and see you around!
Hi. Weren't you chatting with KasperVld on a stream the other day?

indeed I was, and i think you were here too right?

made a post talking about the stream here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124646-Stream-Lost-Kerbals-need-your-help!

Hello, and welcome aboard!

It's good to see the streaming community growing. Good luck with all those kerbal rescues!
I didn't participate. I was just watching.

Thx Dman!

and Vanamonde, watching is participating

I scheduled the next one. you'll find in on the calendar and here for more info:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/calendar.php?do=getinfo&e=186&day=2015-6-13&c=2

See you there!
